title: Giants 2018 NFL Draft plans (Football 04/23)
description:
Nick Kostos makes his triumphant return, joining Will Brinson to go long (45 mins!) on the Giants draft plans, what they should do at quarterback, if Dez Bryant is a fit to replace Brandon Marshall, what they've done this offseason, and how Nick feels about the quarterbacks in this draft class, Jon Gruden's Raiders debut and the Cowboys chance at failure. Plus much, much more.
